game.name: Train Simulator: LMS Stanier Mogul Steam Loco Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Featuring a 2-6-0 wheel configuration and design elements from the GWR, Stanier’s Mogul Class was a fleet of 40 strong and a key player for the railway’s passenger and freight services, and thanks to the efforts of Bossman Games, it can be experienced authentically in Train Simulator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Featuring a 2-6-0 wheel configuration and design elements from the GWR, Stanier’s Mogul Class was a fleet of 40 strong and a key player for the railway’s passenger and freight services, and thanks to the efforts of Bossman Games, it can be experienced authentically in Train Simulator.
